get.description: Processes OAuth callback with authorization code and state

post.description: Refreshes OAuth access token for a specific provider
Imports tools from an OpenAPI specification file (max 10MB)
Imports tools from a GraphQL schema file (max 10MB)
Creates or updates multiple tools at once
Creates or updates multiple mock tools with simplified schema

get.description: Retrieves tools with pagination, filtering, and sorting

parameters.name: _limit
parameters.description: The default limit is 20 tools per request, the maximum is 50

get.description: Retrieves all active tools for the vendor
Retrieves a specific tool by ID with its schema

post.description: Search for tools using natural language queries. Uses vector embeddings to find semantically similar tools.

200.description: Semantic search results with similarity scores

get.description: Fetch deployed widget HTML for mcp-gateway rendering.
Fetch widget HTML by resource URI (for OpenAI ui:// protocol).
Returns statistics for the UI Designer dashboard.
Get all UI data for a tool: global theme, tool theme, schema code, UI code, and sample data.

put.description: Save tool UI data. All fields optional - only provided fields are updated. Set deploy=true to build and deploy.

delete.description: Remove all UI configuration from tool.

post.description: Generate a preview of the widget with themes applied. Does not save or deploy.
Fetch .d.ts type definitions for packages. Returns individual files with virtual paths for browser editor integration (Monaco, CodeMirror).
Creates a new MCP configuration or updates an existing one

200.description: The created or updated MCP configuration

get.description: Retrieves MCP configuration for a specific application
Retrieves list of application IDs that have MCP configurations

delete.description: Deletes an existing MCP configuration source

200.description: List of top tools with usage counts

get.description: Retrieves platform usage statistics for the specified time interval

200.description: List of platforms with usage statistics

Retrieves distinct account count with percentage increase for the specified interval
Retrieves distinct user count with percentage increase for the specified interval

400.description: Invalid request - prompt too short or missing

provider.description: The application integration provider to refresh the token for

appId.description: Application ID to import OpenAPI schema for
Application ID to import GraphQL schema for

description.description: Description of what the tool does
A description of what the tool does

inputSchema.description: JSON Schema describing the tool input parameters

description.description: Description of what the tool does

tools.description: Array of mock tools to upsert

description.description: Description of what the tool does

hasOutputSchema.description: Whether the tool has an outputSchema defined in its schema

hasUI.description: Whether the tool has UI configured

isEligible.description: Whether the tool is eligible for UI (has outputSchema)

resourceDomains.description: Allowed domains for resource loading (scripts, styles)

accessible.description: Whether widget can invoke other tools

sampleData.description: Sample data for testing the widget

platformDiscoveryMeta.description: Platform-specific discovery metadata map. mcp-gateway selects the appropriate metadata based on the requesting AI client.

description.description: Description of what the tool does

hasOutputSchema.description: Whether the tool has an outputSchema defined in its schema

hasUI.description: Whether the tool has UI configured

isEligible.description: Whether the tool is eligible for UI (has outputSchema)

schema.description: Tool schema containing input schema with fields definition

ui.description: Tool UI metadata (null if no UI configured)

description.description: Updated description of what the tool does

outputSchema.description: JSON Schema describing the tool output structure

appId.description: Application ID (if not provided, will be taken from Frontegg context)

queries.description: Array of search query strings (OR logic applied between them)

topK.description: Number of top results to return

tool.description: The tool matching the search query

score.description: Similarity score (0-1, higher is more similar)

results.description: Array of matching tools with their similarity scores

toolsWithUI.description: Number of tools with UI configured

hasGlobalTheme.description: Whether a global theme is configured

globalTheme.description: Global theme CSS that applies to all widgets

css.description: Tool-specific CSS that extends global theme

globalTheme.description: Global theme CSS (max 100KB). Pass empty string to clear.

css.description: Tool-specific CSS (max 100KB). Pass empty string to clear.

schemaCode.description: Zod schema source code (max 100KB). Pass empty string to clear.

uiCode.description: UI component source code (max 100KB). Pass empty string to clear.

deploy.description: If true, deploys the widget after saving. If false, only saves without deploying.

toolId.description: Tool ID to preview widget for

globalTheme.description: Global theme CSS styles (max 100KB). Applied to all widgets.

toolCss.description: Tool-specific CSS styles (max 100KB). Overrides/extends global theme.

sampleInput.description: Sample input data for preview (max 10 depth, 1000 keys, 100KB)

sampleOutput.description: Sample output data for preview (max 10 depth, 1000 keys, 100KB)

platform.description: Target platform for the preview. Affects CDN URLs and runtime behavior.

hash.description: Content hash of the generated HTML

size.description: Size of generated HTML in bytes

skipCache.description: Skip cache and fetch fresh types

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the MCP server (must be HTTPS with valid TLD)

externalAuthorizationUrl.description: External authorization URL (must be HTTPS with valid TLD)

id.description: Unique identifier of the MCP configuration

sourceUrl.description: Source URL for the MCP server (must be HTTPS with valid TLD)

activeUsers.description: Number of active users on this platform

percentageIncrease.description: Percentage increase compared to previous period

url.description: The OAuth authorization server URL to perform DCR against

mcpServerUrl.description: The MCP server URL to connect to after token exchange

authorizeUrl.description: The authorization URL to redirect the user to

clientSecret.description: The client secret obtained from DCR

list.description: Array of string values for the condition. Maximum 100 items, each up to 255 characters

string.description: String value for the condition. Maximum 255 characters

start.description: Start value for the numeric range condition

end.description: End value for the numeric range condition

end.description: End date for the range condition

attribute.description: The attribute name to evaluate in the condition

negate.description: Whether to negate the condition result

op.description: The operation to perform on the attribute

value.description: The value to compare against, structure depends on the operation type

conditions.description: Array of conditions that must be evaluated. Minimum 1, maximum 10 conditions

result.description: The result to return if the conditions are met

approvalFlowId.description: Approval flow ID when policy result requires approval

if.description: The conditions block that defines when this policy applies

then.description: The result block that defines the policy outcome
